original_text:
The scepter will not depart from Judah,
    nor the ruler’s staff from between his feet,
until he to whom it belongs shall come
    and the obedience of the nations shall be his.
korean_text: 규가 유다를 떠나지 아니하며 통치자의 지팡이가 그 발 사이에서 떠나지 아니하기를 실로가 오시기까지 이르리니 그에게 모든 백성이 복종하리로다

sentences.original_text: The scepter will not depart from Judah
nor the ruler's staff from between his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 칼은 그 발 사이에서 떠나지 아니하겠으며

sentences.original_text: until he to whom it belongs shall come
and the obedience of the nations shall be his
